rat:FanOfKnives.NAME: Fan of Knives
rat:FanOfKnives.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice. NL Draw 1 card.
rat:FanOfKnives.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies twice. NL Draw 2 cards.

rat:ColdBlood.NAME: Cold Blood
rat:ColdBlood.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Combo 3: Gain !M! Strength again. NL Exhaust.

rat:Shadowstep.NAME: Shadowstep
rat:Shadowstep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity until the end of the turn.

rat:MimicPod.NAME: Mimic Pod
rat:MimicPod.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards. Gain !M! Strength for each Attack drawn, and gain !M! Dexterity for each Skill drawn.

rat:OpeningStrike.NAME: Opening Strike
rat:OpeningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Innate. Deal !D! damage twice. If this was the first card played this turn, deal !D! damage again. NL Exhaust.

rat:Disembowel.NAME: Disembowel
rat:Disembowel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Combo 2: Apply !M! Weak. Combo 3: Apply !M! Vulnerable. Combo 5: Deal !D! damage again. Combo 6: Add a copy of this card to your hand.

rat:Lunge.NAME: Lunge
rat:Lunge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Combo 2: Gain !B! Block next turn. Combo 3: Gain !M! Plated Armor. Combo 5: Gain !M! Metalicize. Combo 6: Gain !M! Dexterity. Exhaust.

rat:WitheringShackles.NAME: Withering Shackles
rat:WitheringShackles.DESCRIPTION: Apply 3 Weak. The enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

rat:AtrophicSteroids.NAME: Atrophic Steroids
rat:AtrophicSteroids.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. Lose 5 Strength and Dexterity at the end of your turn. Poison yourself for 6. NL Exhaust.
rat:AtrophicSteroids.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. Lose 7 Strength and Dexterity at the end of your turn. Poison yourself for 6. NL Exhaust.

rat:EchoingStrikes.NAME: Echoing Strikes
rat:EchoingStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Exhaust. NL Combo 2: Has Echo.

rat:Dispatch.NAME: Dispatch
rat:Dispatch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply (!M! + your current Strength) Bleeding.

rat:VenomousWounds.NAME: Venomous Wounds
rat:VenomousWounds.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an attack deal unblocked damage, if the target is Poisoned, apply !M! Bleeding, and if the target is Bleeding, apply !M! Poison.

rat:Exsanguinate.NAME: Exsanguinate
rat:Exsanguinate.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! times the Bleed stacks on the target, then remove all Bleed from said target.

rat:Garrote.NAME: Garrote
rat:Garrote.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Combo 2: Apply 1 Vulnerable and !M! Bleeding. Exhaust. Combo 3: Has Echo instead of Exhaust.

rat:BloodPact.NAME: Blood Pact
rat:BloodPact.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each turn, gain 1 Bleeding, !M! Dexterity, !M! Strength and [G].

rat:DextrousStrike.NAME: Dextrous Strike
rat:DextrousStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal ( !D! + your current Dexterity ) damage twice. Does not scale with Strength.

rat:SiphonBlood.NAME: Siphon Blood
rat:SiphonBlood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to every enemy affected by Bleeding. Then, remove all Bleeding from all enemies and heal for 25% of the amount.

rat:SilverCoating.NAME: Silver Coating
rat:SilverCoating.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you deal more than 8 damage to an enemy, apply 1 Silvered.

rat:MoondustBomb.NAME: Moondust Bomb
rat:MoondustBomb.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Apply !M! Silvered to all enemies.

rat:SilverDagger.NAME: Silver Dagger
rat:SilverDagger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Combo 4: apply !M! Silvered.

rat:ArgentInfusion.NAME: Argent Infusion
rat:ArgentInfusion.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each Silvered stack on every enemy.

rat:SiphonSilver.NAME: Siphon Silver
rat:SiphonSilver.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack an enemy affected by Silvered, heal for 2 times the amount of silvered.

rat:Sprint.NAME: Sprint
rat:Sprint.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Combo 2: Draw !M! more cards.
